TopicTitle: Addon to assist with Survey missions

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I always have difficulties getting the right inclination for 'flyby temperature missions' plus there is only a message when you enter and leave a zone. So there doesn't seem to be an indication when you are in a zone, which would be useful.

Is there an addon that helps with better visualisation of the zone in map view and better indication when you are in a specific zone?

tx!

Yes, I see the problem with default markers too. And I would be really happy if such mod really exists. Well, if not, maybe I'll try to make a plugin that could help with navigation but I don't know if it is possible to get access to the classes that are responsible for this marker system.

I am working on a such thing already , take a look :

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104916-WIP-Runway-illumination-Flight-instruments

Have you seen this? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104758

@bandi94: looks interesting - I'll be watching your thread.
